package programs;

//import java.util.Scanner;




public class astrickf {
	

	

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

				System.out.println( "Number : 5");
			
				
				//astrickf n1 = new astrickf();
		//Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		//int num =  sc.nextInt();
		
		for (int i=0; i<5; i++)
		{
			
				
			
			for(int j =5; j>i; j--)
			{
			System.out.print("*");
			}
			
			System.out.println("");
		
		}
		
		
		
		
		
	}

}
